hero.subtitle: As a leading importer of high-quality automobile parts in Armenia, Solution.am is dedicated to providing reliable and creative solutions for all your vehicle needs.

about.title: About Solution.am
about.description: Established in 2000, Solution.am is a leading reseller and importer of high-quality automobile parts, serving customers all across Armenia. With a rich history of collaboration and a commitment to excellence, we provide creative and reliable solutions for all your vehicle needs.

customer1.quote: Solution.am has the best selection of parts. I found exactly what I needed for my car, and the quality was top-notch. Highly recommended!

customer2.quote: The customer service is outstanding. They helped me find the right part and it arrived faster than I expected. I'll definitely be a returning customer.

customer3.quote: As a mechanic, I rely on quality parts. Solution.am delivers every time. Their creative solutions and reliable inventory make my job easier.

customer4.quote: I was looking for a very specific part and they had it in stock! The website is easy to navigate and the whole process was seamless.
